website_summaries.verdict: The Mavic Mini’s smartphone-like weight, gorgeous camera, and ultra-precise controls are proof that big things really do come in small packages.
pros: Easy to pilot and hover in place
Companion app is a must-have for beginners
cons: Fairly expensive, but it’s a remarkable little drone

customer_reviews.title: Blown away how cheap and good this drone is.
customer_reviews.text: I built a quad several years ago. It was very difficult to fly and had no camera, gimbal, etc... I've heard a lot about DJI over the years, so I decided to try the Mavic Mini with the $400 price (this was double what the parts cost me for my first drone!) My phone didn't support the DJI Play app, so after BUYING A NEWER PHONE I was able to fly the Mavic Mini. I am blown away! Stable, smooth, I am VERY happy with my purchase. Video is clear, sharp, and excellent frame rate. More than enough for personal use, or even YouTube videos.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Muckleroy

customer_reviews.title: Rock steady. Better than any 'toy' I've had.
customer_reviews.text: Rock steady flight hold. Works well with my 6s phone. Smooth flight controls. Can actually land manually. Good indicators on the app. Did 5 short flights on first day. I live the gimbal that can go up and down for shots.
customer_reviews.author: EPSGUNNER

customer_reviews.title: Never Buy This Product!
customer_reviews.text: My wife got this for me for Christmas. I've only flown it a few times. I was going straight up the other day to get over some trees to photograph a property when suddenly it randomly flew straight into a 100 foot tall tree. It is still up there. I could hear it beeping when I activated the find my drone feature. I called DJI and waited on eternal hold for over an hour and fifteen minutes before I hung up. I emailed them and have not heard anything. I will never buy another DJI product again in my life and I would highly discourage anyone from buying one.
customer_reviews.author: joel mattila

customer_reviews.title: Why my drones
customer_reviews.text: I had 2 DJI Mavic’s . First one was defective, had it replaced no problem. Then I received my replacement which was great. But now I have had a bad experience with both. Over land perfect. Over a body of water some how the drone gets confused and down it goes into the water, never to be seen again. I have lost both into the water. I’m so upset first that the drone did that and second the money spent on 2 drones. 😥 I there anything that can be done to help getting another one for less cost?
customer_reviews.author: Sharon C. Green

customer_reviews.title: You’re going to need to charge the main drone battery
customer_reviews.text: It’s awesome, super light. It comes with different cables for iPhone or android phones . The remote battery was pre-charged but the drone battery needed charging
customer_reviews.author: Sergio Betancourt jr

customer_reviews.title: Check to see if your phone is compatible!
customer_reviews.text: I get everything charged and set up, and then I'm greeted with a "your device is not compatible" message on the app store for the DJI Fly app. The app required to fly is only compatible with an extremely small list of phones. There is no warning about this anywhere. Waste of $400.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Inoperable: firmware instability
customer_reviews.text: Purchased brand new dji mavic mini - battery rendered inoperable upon firmware update: cell error 30074. This error renders device inoperable and useless although battery and controller were fully charged. Contacted customer service but they would not help. Product quality and compatibility from manufacturer is poor. Price point is fair if it actually functioned. Service is questionable.
customer_reviews.author: Coco

customer_reviews.title: Hold on buying this product till end of the year.
customer_reviews.text: Download the b4ufly before buying this product because you might be in restriction zone and will not be able to flight it even inside the house. When I tried unlocking the restriction I received this email from DJI: "Your Custom Unlocking application (Tracking Number: xxxx) has been rejected because of the reason below: Kindly note that Mavic Mini doesn't support to unlock the No Fly Zone currently. We will launch a new version of the aircraft firmware and DJI Fly App in late December to support unlock the no-fly zone. Please pay attention to the official announcement. Thank you for your understanding and support."
customer_reviews.author: Persican

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy photography but often wish I could get wider shots of the places I travel or unobstructed sunsets. I have had this drone for about a week now and I have found it to be great for aerial photography and just doing fun stuff during isolation. I highly recommend watching several videos prior to use; watch an unboxing, a set up, a first flight, and then be sure to watch how to access some of the cool pre-programmed shot options. I also recommend buying a case that fits the pieces properly. And an extra battery. You'll be amazed at how fast 30 minutes goes by, especially when you're messing around and figuring stuff out. Totally worth it though.
customer_reviews.author: K. Buckley

customer_reviews.title: Geo Zone restricted, check first where you live
customer_reviews.text: If you live in a so called "Geo Zone", near an airport or the like, the drone will not take off. I understand that eventually DJI will release the unlocking software, but right now till the end of December it will not fly at all in a Geo Zone. Update: DJI made unlocking possible, but only for IPHONES. Not for Android.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: drone and controller would not bind
customer_reviews.text: never got a chance to try it out cause the controller and quad would never bind. supposed to be done at point of manufacture. I tried the manual procedure by pushing power button on controller the power on drone. they both did the blinking of lights and beeping but never became bound. DJI FLY app also did not like my phone even though it is a version 9 Android. not happy with DJI software. message said drone would have to be activated before 1st time use by using the App. if you cant get the app to work with your phone, there is no way to activate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SOFTWARE MAY NOT LOAD ON YOUR PHONE!!
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this drone. They have a list of specific phones the software will load on and if you go to their support community even those phone don't always work. I am returning this drone with great disappointment. Who makes software that only works on specific phones???
customer_reviews.author: jkassak

customer_reviews.title: Charging issues
customer_reviews.text: The thing is fun to fly but only comes with a cable to charge. You have to have a specific type of charger or your not going to be able to charge it. I give it two stars because of this. Ultimately I sent it back because of this issue. Bought the fly more package after the return. The unit was dead on arrival with multiple error codes showing. DJI told me to return that one as well. I'm done with DJI for now. It's sucks because I wanted to like this thing so badly.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Hands down best bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: It literally doesn't get any better than this unless you spend 500 more. I've had my battery charged for couple days and your not supposed to leave them charged for long period of time. so last night I turn it on in my living and hit launch on the controller and then set my controller down. This drone hovered right there without moving an inch while I watched my show. When your flying it's so smooth and only does what you tell it too. The pictures and video are amazing too
customer_reviews.author: Dylan calandro

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: My husband has been absolutely loving this done. It’s a perfect size for traveling, it us lightweight so the flying rules are more lenient, and DJI has comprehensive info on where you are allowed to fly and will even stop the drone from entering no-fly zones. The no-fly maps are easy to navigate. Great price for the value, great video quality including stabilization. Fly into the wind so the drone is being assisted by the wind when flying back home. Has been useful doing inspections of the roof and gutter at our house, and keeping away birds this Spring. Such a handy toy!
customer_reviews.author: LimitLess Reviews

customer_reviews.title: The best drone for a serious begnner
customer_reviews.text: It's way better than any cheaper "toy" drone. Very compact but strong (can maintain position for ~ 20 MPH wind). The battery is good for about 30 mins but the low battery alarm is loud and annoying. The image and video quality is good enough for most non-professional people. The remote control is ok though it's easy to lose signal if you're in a high interference place, as it uses wifi. No yaw speed control is the biggest issue for me. No active tracking. No obstacle avoid sensor.
customer_reviews.author: Tsonga

customer_reviews.title: Great drone for the price - but I can't get anywhere near stated range
customer_reviews.text: This is huge value for money, but beware - this is a gateway drug to more expensive drones. It is so good that you can focus on the flying and will want more. Pros: Excellent camera, amazing software, ultra stable video and stable GPS, compass and optically stabilized flight. Cons: Software is limited compared to other DJI drones. In a rural area with houses about 1 acre apart, I can get about 600-700ft away before losing signal... far less than others report. Will likely be returning this and getting an ocusync-capable drone instead. No obstacle sensors except in downward direction.
customer_reviews.author: Mod MINI

customer_reviews.title: Great Mid Level Drone
customer_reviews.text: Great little drone. I would say the Mini is an entry level intermediate drone. No obstacle avoidance like you would get from the Mavic Air but you can get 27 minutes of flight fairly consistently. The size is comparable to the Mavic Air. Just be careful of flying in wind and remember that whatever the wind speed is at the ground, will be exponentially faster at 300-400 feet. All in all, I'd say this is a great next step up from a DJI Spark or Ryze/DJI Tello. Something for someone with some experience but still a beginner.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Clark

customer_reviews.title: Best drone ever!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the DJI mavic mini! It is everything and more then what I thought it would be! Easy to fly! Great pictures and videos! This is the way to go if you want a name brand drone but for a more affordable price! Honestly you can't tell much difference in picture and video quality. I absolutely love it only takes seconds to become a pretty good at flying the mavic mini. Everything about is well designed! You won't regret buying this drone!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Product malfunctioned within a week of receiving it. I bought DJI refresh and was suppose to get a replacement within a week. I received it on the 31st day after my amazon purchase. That’s 1 day to late to return the item. I spoke to a DJI rep and he actually stated that they delay these types of request on purpose. Plus what drone stops working on you within a week??
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Great toy or tool.
customer_reviews.text: The seller shipped quick and the drone works great. I have used this 4-5 times in past month for getting aerial images of buildings for work. One building is 7 stories tall and was just flying around it and snapping pics. Before I took it out the first time, I downloaded a number of drone flying apps on ipad and found one that had similar controls to the drone. I practiced on that the night before my maiden flight.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Everson

customer_reviews.title: Great drone (no avoidance), but range is very limited
customer_reviews.text: Loved the controls, vid/pics are great, doesn't have obstacle avoidance. Battery life good - as advertised. however the range is so limited, about 400 ft and it will lose all contact and return to home. Range was limited for me in less populated areas also. Also it trys to return to home about 20 ft away from where it started, which puts it in trees/cliffs...etc. - needs improvement aslo.
customer_reviews.author: strick9

customer_reviews.title: This thing is SO GREAT!! Stable as ^&%*%
customer_reviews.text: It takes nothing to learn how to fly this baby. Video is SOO stable and clean. DO NOT buy a cheap drone to learn with.. this was my 2nd drone and anything else is junk compared to this. the 249 gram weight is awesome because you don't have to deal with the FAA if your doing normal flights in un-controlled air space. Check your area with "B4UFly" app and you will know what kind of air space you are in before you get it. I have a cel tower that messes with me a bit but I can still get about 1/2 mile in that direction and about 2800 feet out in other directions.
customer_reviews.author: P. Ellison

customer_reviews.title: BEST BEGINNER VIDEO DRONE
customer_reviews.text: This works so well so many people are complaining about it. I’m able to get High quality footage that I need for my videos. 2.7k is really good. If you are looking at this to start I highly recommend this. It’s a lot of fun and I was able to fly for 26 minutes!
customer_reviews.author: Gavin Penor

customer_reviews.title: BUY ONE YOU WONT REGRET IT
customer_reviews.text: I have the larger mavic pro and assumed this would end up being more of a toy to let my kids play with . I was wrong . This is the best $400 I’ve spent in a looong time . If you’re on the fence about getting one Trust me it’s incredible . It’s the same machine as the big ones minus few small changes . I’ve owned one of every phantom several Yuneec drones and this one is in my top 3 to fly . It’s a blast
customer_reviews.author: Carlos spicy wiener

customer_reviews.title: This is a professional drone with beginner-like features!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, this drone is OUTSTANDING FOR THE PRICE!! If you want a great build and high quality drone that is under 250 grams, there is no better drone for you that is under 250 grams that you can buy. JUST BUY IT NOW, IT IS INCREDIBLE, SO MUCH BANG FOR YOUR BUCK!!!! If you want a really high quality professional drone that can be used by beginners, this drone is for you!!! This drone is my favorite! Why I did not get this drone before, I don't know. Just buy it now because it is that good, you will thank me later!
customer_reviews.author: DDIP

customer_reviews.title: Which Android Tablets Work With the Fly software?
customer_reviews.text: Works great with Samsung phone; what Android tablets work with DJI Fly software?
customer_reviews.author: Spiritbeing

customer_reviews.title: I am very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I always heard great things about this drone. I have owned 3dr robotics and on the lower end the parrot bebop. The parrot bebop blows this mini drone away. It says you can set all these features for it to fly at high altitude and distances. The minute you go about a block away. you get "wind warnings" "out of area warning" and "losing connection". Wow, that was a waste of money I bought all the extras light extra batterys and etc etc.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Catroppo

customer_reviews.title: Crashed my first one!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace one that I crashed while filming a YouTube video. I tried to fly the drone through a covered bridge and then back again. Well I over estimated the height coming back and CRASH! I like DJI products as they perform well and are reliable. I have a Mavic 2 Zoom as well. I would highly recommend this drone as the 2.7k video is great and the maneuverability of this tiny drone is great. Flight time is very good as well.
customer_reviews.author: DaddyMac

customer_reviews.title: Best starter drone
customer_reviews.text: I bought this drone having no experience flying. After watching a few online tutorials and the ease of use with this drone I am comfortable flying this in most environments. The distance, software, battery, and camera are the most amazing features of the Mini. The camera is amazing and how smooth the videos are. The battery lasts for 30 minutes if you are just flying around. If you are doing video I have shot a 25 minute video and still had enough battery power to bring drone safely back to me. If you want to get into drone anything get this drone first!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Moore

customer_reviews.title: Connection Glitchy at less than 500 ft distance
customer_reviews.text: The mini does not give the distance that it boasts and I am flying in a large clear area. Also, there seems to be a malfunction with the remote and or the gimbal itself as it seems to constantly freeze. Leas than thrilled and sending back for an exchange to try once more. Side note, the propeller guards never came, and they gave me the opportunity for a full refund. I am giving them the benefit of the doubt they will still send the guards and do a full replacement. I will update once new unit arrives. This is my third drone so i expected better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dk.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great starter drone and very easy to understand how to use. There are plenty of resources online to help guide you. There was only 1 thing that really bothered me. DJI should provide at least 1 power adapter when buying their product instead of only offering it in $100 fly more kit. If you dont get an power adapter you will have to go buy a quick charger that charges at 18V. The battery is shipped in hibernation mode if you dont have the right charger you will never get over 2 charging lights and the drone will not fly.
customer_reviews.author: shaun harrison

customer_reviews.title: Failed in 3 days, would not charge
customer_reviews.text: Fun toy when it worked, after 3 days of use battery would not charge, I tried using several usb adapters with no luck
customer_reviews.author: Amir

customer_reviews.title: Great DJI drone
customer_reviews.text: As one of the cheapest DJI drones on the market, this one is great in almost every area. It is under 250 grams which is a plus. It has a beautiful 2.7K camera, and is easy to fly. This drone does NOT have an obstacle avoidance system, so be mindful of where you are flying, as I have crashed this thing before and had to send it in to get it fixed. It is not a cheap fix either. Once you get this amazing drone, purchase the warranty from DJI's website, it will save you so much money in the long run. Overall great drone for the price, just be careful and mindful of where you are flying.
customer_reviews.author: Luke K

customer_reviews.title: Great drone for a first time user.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great drone with great camera capabilities. The take off and return to home is very simple to use. As a 48 year old guy who was a little concerned about controlling this was quickly gone after my first flight. I highly recommend buying this drone.
customer_reviews.author: scott shedden

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little drone all around
customer_reviews.text: Advantages: Small, pocket size - easy to carry around. Doesn't need registration. Easy to fly, nice features. Great camera - resolution, sharpness and contrast are great, good color representation. Amazingly stable videos, even in gusting wind. No video shake even during sharp maneurs. All in all, this little drone by far exceeded my expectations. On the negative side - SW need some more work, the DJI Fly App. locks up in certain screens, need to restart. This doesn't prevent you from flying the drone, it is just a bit annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Baborigen

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Drone. To my surprise, this quad copter was really easy to fly. You press one button and it takes off and hovers at about 3 feet waiting for your directions. It is extremely stable in flight. The phone app works very well with my Pixel 3 XL. The video quality is superb. It warns you when the battery is too low and urges you to immediately land. So far I have had no regrets getting this baby.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos A Navas

customer_reviews.title: I tossed the props, using Spark props.
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME!!!! However DJI could've scaled down props from the Platinum and slapped them on the Mini as this thing is super loud for a drone this size.
customer_reviews.author: A.J.

customer_reviews.title: Good drone for beginners. Fly with caution
customer_reviews.text: This thing is really light and small so you need to really watch wind speed. Something so small it fits in your hand means it can't handle the higher winds especially up high at 400 feet. I use oktofly add the .com to that or hover app. I have the Mavic Pro which is much heavier and it will handle the winds.
customer_reviews.author: Van G.

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding!
customer_reviews.text: Incredible little drone! It's light, so you have to really be careful of the winds that you decide to fly in. It is packed with technology and really takes some amazing pics!! It's great for first time Drone Pilots! I really wouldn't recommend this for kids, this is not that kind of drone!! The drone gives you a lot of information to make the right decisions for safe flight and the return home. Well worth the money!! Great experience!!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Super fun drone when it works properly.
customer_reviews.text: I've now had two Mavic Mini's as my first one had bugged out heavily. For both, the remote control refuses to be calibrated correctly. It's constantly locked at 1% left and 2% back on the right joystick, not matter how many times I calibrate it. And for both remotes, every time I turn the remote control off and then back on, the remote control beeps continuously until I "calibrate it". Very disappointed so far. Going to return both drones and hold off on picking this up for awhile. EDIT: After the 12/4/19 update, everything seems to be perfectly fine! Great job fixing this, DJI!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s a wonderful drone
customer_reviews.text: It’s a wonderful drone. However, I do believe that whoever gets this product, please do some research before you take off. I recommend getting the propeller guards for small range early flights. Practice with tiny and simple maneuvers. It seems very delicate. The brand is the Apple product of drones. We’ll see how the product holds up and stable the software stays.
customer_reviews.author: Inferno

customer_reviews.title: Great drone for your first drone
customer_reviews.text: Great drone to learn how to fly . I would keep all settings for photos/videos set to auto till you have learn how to fly in a safe way then watch youtube to learn how to set your settings to get the best photos/videos. Check out dronexfactor on youtube. Keep safe and have fun.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Best beginner done on the market today. Affordable done!
customer_reviews.text: A fantastic beginners drone and we'll with the money. I would highly recommend you get the Fly More Combo. It is well with the extra $100.00. I am wishing I had gone that route. Don't waste your money on toy drones if you are truly looking for a drone that flies great,returns home and has great picture and video quality,with GPS and3 axis gimbal. You can't go wrong with the DJI MAVIC MINI as your first real done.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Green

customer_reviews.title: Dji Mini
customer_reviews.text: Having fun with the drone. Dji is a nice unit. Top of the line as far as i can see. Unit is a little fragile if not careful so would not recommend this for young flyers without guidance.
customer_reviews.author: Mark DeBiase

customer_reviews.title: Kick ass easy
customer_reviews.text: Thought I would need some time to figure this thing out. 10 min and you are an expert and I have never played a video game in my life. Picture quality is far beyond what I expected. Great product, well thought out software, could not be more impressed. Wish it were an American company.
customer_reviews.author: Clark Schnell

customer_reviews.title: PURCHASE WAS WELL WORTH IT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My first drone I ever bought. It is absolutely perfect for beginners. I got mine a month ago and I already ordered a mavic air 2. The quality on this little drone is absolutely amazing. What my mistake was. Was I didn't by the fly more package. The controls on this are so easy . That a little kid can fly it with no problem. I deffinitly recommend to anyone who is wanting to get into the drone photoghapy life.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph M

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this drone and received it two days later after I got it I immediately let it charge and try to quiet I connected the controller but for some reason the aircraft is not connecting for this reason I am returning this merchandise and wants my payment back and full
customer_reviews.author: Maurice

customer_reviews.title: It's a DJI of course it's good
customer_reviews.text: No complaints. love the small compact size of it. both the remote and the drone fold up to fit in my center console so I always have the drone with me. over all a great drone and switching from a Phantom 3 to the Mavic mini was a great choice for me.
customer_reviews.author: A. Reeves

customer_reviews.title: Amazing dji drone
customer_reviews.text: This dji mavic mini is one amazing drone.. Even though it doesn't have obstacle avoidance it is still over the top for the price you pay.. If you are an experienced drone flyer you won't need obstacle avoidance anyway.. I recommend this drone to any drone fanatic that can't afford to buy the dji mavic pro
customer_reviews.author: Kurtis Williams

customer_reviews.title: This doesn't work and good luck figuring out why
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mavic mini, used it for about twenty minutes and then spent four hours on tech support videos and chats trying to get it to work again. It's a piece of overpriced junk with terrible support.
customer_reviews.author: Rashmi

customer_reviews.title: Buy the fly more combo instead!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good all purpose drone. I regret not buying the fly more combo that came with 2 extra batteries. Now, the batteries have doubled in price as if they are using a newly discovered lithium variant. Other than the battery price, I really enjoy my 20 to 30 minutes of flight time per charge.
customer_reviews.author: Hajilo

customer_reviews.title: DJI has a winner!
customer_reviews.text: Not a beginner but this is my first DJI product. I'm loving this little bird...very stable flight and amazing video footage for what it's capable of. Updates keep making it even better. For the price this is the best bang for the buck in the drone industry at the moment and I see it only getting more popular.
customer_reviews.author: Willie

customer_reviews.title: Product might not be what it says
customer_reviews.text: I did not like how I received the item opened the propellers have dents in them which clearly means the item was used and it was not packed as if it came in the original packing and plastic wrap and to some it up I did not receive the Instructions for the drone.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little drone
customer_reviews.text: I am way past impressed with this little drone, range, image quality, stability... I can’t complain about the lightweight build of it as far as durability goes, I mean, It’s that light and plasticky for a reason. $400. Still, it’s a steal
customer_reviews.author: Tony C

customer_reviews.title: It's an amazing little drone, but the seller sent me one from Australia for some reason.
customer_reviews.text: I got the mavic mini, but I got all sorts of paperwork from NZ and Australia. I think they sell different versions in different countries so I thought that was weird.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: No obstacle avoidance, horrible build quality
customer_reviews.text: Feels like a cheap toy, marketed for beginners yet has 0 obstacle avoidance sensors, no autonamous tracking etc. Do yourself a favor and try to find a better drone used unless all you care about is the weight.
customer_reviews.author: God

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations!
customer_reviews.text: This drone is such a great, fun, but very reliable product, and the videos and photos are stunning! I would greatly recommend this drone for the money.🙂
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Believe the hype!
customer_reviews.text: I did my research. Didn’t wanna buy twice. I AM SUPER PLEASED with my purchase. Exactly what it is supposed to do- IT DOES. Excellent video quality and easy controls. Easily the best drone in the 500$ and under bracket. Some say for the 1000$ and under bracket. Buy now!
customer_reviews.author: James harris

customer_reviews.title: Mavic drone
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this drone. A lot of fun and almost impossible to crash. I would only suggest you buy extra batteries when buying the drone. You will need it because the drone is so easy and fun to fly
customer_reviews.author: SHANNON SMITH

customer_reviews.title: Amazing piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: Amazing out of the package. This will have you in the air in 10 minutes. Buy the fly more combo, I regret not having more batteries and already spend the additional 100 on 2 batteries only. Buy the damn thing already.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth L.

customer_reviews.title: Good drone for the money
customer_reviews.text: Excellent drone but wish it could track moving targets. Lot of fun and easy. I live about 5 miles from airport. Would not let me takeoff even indoors until I figured out how to unlock the geo fence.
customer_reviews.author: jo

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Drone
customer_reviews.text: Have been wanting a drone for a long time just could not justify the cost of the other models. When this one came on the market i did a ton of research and watched a bunch of review videos before making the decision to purchase. After it arrived i tested it out as soon as it was charged. Flys great, easy to handle, and the picture/video quality is amazing. For never having a drone before this one makes it easy to get up and going quickly. Its so small and portable so easy to take anywhere. Cant wait to get it out more.
customer_reviews.author: Bryon Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Graduation gift for my daughter and she loves it. She learned to fly it in one evening, very easy to use. She wanted it to take pictures and the video/picture quality is amazing. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: bmw

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT fly in windy conditions!!!
customer_reviews.text: The mavic mini turns into a kite with the slightest bit of wind. In suburbs, the signal is only good for half a mile or so. otherwise a great little drone. I really love it. btw, make sure you purchase the dji care refresh.
customer_reviews.author: HP

customer_reviews.title: Does everything it promises
customer_reviews.text: Easy to fly, incredible pictures and videos, software well thought out. Very happy to be part of the crowd that can post a different perspective photo on the holiday snap. Just worry performance on range in built up areas with crowded WiFi space.

Mavic Mini supports 12MP aerial photos and 2.7K HD videos. A 3-axis motorized gimbal provides superior camera stability and ensures clear, Ultra-smooth footage
Mavic Mini’s weight allows it to stay in the air longer than similar consumer FlyCams on the market. Enjoy up to 30 minutes of flight time with a fully-charged battery
